name: Digits!
description:
This is my second project for my Games & IM Class!

You play as my cat, Digit, as he hunts how his prey!  Try the grab the rodent before it gets away from your paws!

Controls:

Downloading:

Open GL was being a bit tough with me so it's been made available as a download for Windows or Mac instead!  

This file might be a little scary to my classmates so I'm going to do a small walkthrough for downloading it on Windows and Mac systems. 

Windows:

You will want to pick the Windows logo download  on this page and then download the file. Once downloaded, you will want to extract or "unzip" the files contents . Once extracted, open the file and search for the "Demo Demo" file . Double-click that file and you will be off to enjoy a great cat adventure!

Mac:

Mac users should click the apple logo, and then download the file. Double click  the downloaded file to play the game! Enjoy!
